meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dirty or impure.
meanings.sent1: The uncleanliness of the kitchen made me lose my appetite.
meanings.sent2: The uncleanliness of the bathroom was evident from the foul odor.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the uncleanliness of his room seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: The uncleanliness of the city streets mirrored the chaos within.
meanings.sent5: The uncleanliness of the pond was so severe that even the ducks avoided it.

meanings.sent1: The uncleanliness in the restaurant's kitchen led to health code violations.
meanings.sent2: The uncleanliness of the public restroom was concerning to the patrons.
meanings.sent3: The uncleanliness of his appearance was a stark contrast to his usual neatness.
meanings.sent4: The uncleanliness of the situation made it clear that immediate action was necessary.
meanings.sent5: The uncleanliness of the school cafeteria was a breeding ground for germs.
